Regulation Name(s): Culture medium for antimicrobial susceptibility tests
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Selective and differential chromogenic culture medium
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for HardyCHROM MRSA chromogenic culture medium for detecting nasal colonization by MRSA.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of nasal colonization by methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) from anterior nares swabs to aid in prevention and control of MRSA infections in healthcare settings; not for diagnosis or therapy monitoring.
